overview: Gorgeous blond bombshell Dasha just landed the role of Juliet in Shakespeare's classic. But this budding thespian is a little nervous. The Bard's original vision has been slightly altered and play is going to be performed in the nude. Shakespeare may not have intended Romeo & Juliet to be performed in the nude, but Dasha doesn't need to know that. Watch as she sheds her stage fright, her clothes and her inhibitions in Ren Savant's erotic, Shakespeare Revealed. This is Shakespeare you'll never forget.
title: Shameless Desire
